body:
I've found that "fixed #954" doesn't work in commit message for some reason, or at least is very finicky. It works much better for me to put it in the PR's body (or the commit body, which shows up in the PR body).

As to squashing commits: Normandy has decided that we prefer to maintain history. Both approaches have pros and cons, and historically the Normandy team decided we prefer this way. Separately from that, bors doesn't support squash merges yet.
